column4: The installer encountered an error copying files to te hard disk: [Errno 5] Input/ouput error: '/rofs/usr/share/gconf/schemas/compiz-annotate.schemas' This is often due to a faulty CD/DVD disk or drive. It may help to clean the CD/DVD, to burn the CD/DVD at a lower speed, or to clean the CD/DVD drive lens...
